data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade Maurice Dufrasne - Oostende kick-off to start the match.
Nicolas Raskin (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 22, Kostas Laifis is on a sub for Zinho Vanheusden for Liege.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Liege with the kick-off.
In the minute 52, Fashion Sakala for Oostende has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
At Stade Maurice Dufrasne, Jelle Bataille has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Liege make their second substitution with Maxime Lestienne replacing Aleksandar Boljevic.
In the minute 69, Alexander Blessin is making the team's first substitution at Stade Maurice Dufrasne with Cameron McGeehan replacing Jack Hendry.
The away team replace Makhtar Gueye with Marko Kvasina.
Ari Skulason is replacing Andrew Hjulsager for the away team.
In the minute 87, Oostende's Kevin Vandendriessche has been booked in Liege.
Goal! Noe Dussenne gives Liege a 1-0 lead.
The match has come to a close in Liege. The final score is 1-0.
